metadata.title: CVE-2024-0046 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In installExistingPackageAsUser of InstallPackageHelper.java, there is apossible carrier restriction bypass due to a logic error in the code. Thiscould lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional executionprivileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.

criterions.comment: android-framework-23 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
android-platform-frameworks-base package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
